Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem (O'Hare)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (O'Hare) due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (O'Hare) due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
